author: The Hitlist Team
title: Spotted: Shruti Haasan with rumoured boyfriend Michael Corsale at Mumbai airport
text:
Shruti Haasan and Michael Corsale. Pic/Yogen Shah 
Shruti Haasan was snapped with rumoured beau Michael Corsale, sporting matching footwear on their arrival at the Mumbai airport.
  Every step counts - together or apart - walk to your own sunshine 
A post shared by @shrutzhaasan onFeb 14, 2017 at 7:19pm PST
 
While the actress prefers to keep her personal life under wraps, we have found out that Michael, also an actor, is from London. Shruti got to know him through common friends in the UK.
